snippet.title: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes Tokyo Game Show 2022 Trailer (ESRB)
snippet.description:
Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes Tokyo Game Show 2022 Trailer

Over 100 unique and charming heroes join forces with the game’s protagonists in a tightly-woven story about a war-torn continent. Through a unique system, players are able to expand the town that serves as their home base, opening new shops and managing the town guilds. The turn-based combat puts players in control of up to 6 fighters, providing immersive and fast-paced battles that vary up character formation and follow the action with a dynamic camera. 

The game was funded through Kickstarter on July 27, 2020, soaring past its minimum goal of $500,000 and successfully raising over $4.6 million. 

Wishlist Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes: https://505.games/ECHH

Visit the official Eiyuden Chronicle website at https://EiyudenChronicleGame.com 

Visit the official Eiyuden Chronicle social channels below: 
Eiyuden Chronicle Discord: https://discord.com/invite/eiyuden
Eiyuden Chronicle Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/eiyudenchronicle
Eiyuden Chronicle Twitter - https://twitter.com/eiyuden
Eiyuden Chronicle Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/eiyudenchronicle
